% BEAGLE Scientific Paper Template - Preamble
% Comprehensive LaTeX setup for high-quality scientific papers
% Generated by BEAGLE v0.10.0

% Document class customization
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}

% Modern font selection (requires XeLaTeX or LuaLaTeX)
\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont{Latin Modern Roman}
\setsansfont{Latin Modern Sans}
\setmonofont{Latin Modern Mono}

% Page geometry - A4 with comfortable margins
\usepackage[a4paper, margin=2.5cm]{geometry}

% Enhanced graphics and figures
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{float}
\usepackage{subfig}
\usepackage{caption}
\captionsetup{
    font=small,
    labelfont=bf,
    format=plain,
    justification=justified,
}

% Professional tables
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{tabularx}
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{multirow}
\usepackage{array}

% Mathematics
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{amssymb}
\usepackage{amsthm}
\usepackage{mathtools}
\usepackage{physics}

% Chemistry (optional, comment out if not needed)
% \usepackage{chemfig}
% \usepackage{chemmacros}

% Code listings with syntax highlighting
\usepackage{listings}
\usepackage{xcolor}

\definecolor{codegreen}{rgb}{0,0.6,0}
\definecolor{codegray}{rgb}{0.5,0.5,0.5}
\definecolor{codepurple}{rgb}{0.58,0,0.82}
\definecolor{backcolour}{rgb}{0.95,0.95,0.92}

\lstdefinestyle{beaglestyle}{
    backgroundcolor=\color{backcolour},
    commentstyle=\color{codegreen},
    keywordstyle=\color{magenta},
    numberstyle=\tiny\color{codegray},
    stringstyle=\color{codepurple},
    basicstyle=\ttfamily\footnotesize,
    breakatwhitespace=false,
    breaklines=true,
    captionpos=b,
    keepspaces=true,
    numbers=left,
    numbersep=5pt,
    showspaces=false,
    showstringspaces=false,
    showtabs=false,
    tabsize=2
}
\lstset{style=beaglestyle}

% Hyperlinks and references
\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{
    colorlinks=true,
    linkcolor=blue,
    filecolor=magenta,
    urlcolor=cyan,
    citecolor=blue,
    pdftitle={BEAGLE Generated Paper},
    pdfauthor={BEAGLE AI System},
    pdfsubject={Scientific Research},
    pdfkeywords={AI, Science, BEAGLE},
    bookmarksnumbered=true,
    bookmarksopen=true,
}

% Cross-referencing enhancement
\usepackage{cleveref}
\crefname{figure}{Figure}{Figures}
\crefname{table}{Table}{Tables}
\crefname{equation}{Equation}{Equations}
\crefname{section}{Section}{Sections}

% Bibliography
\usepackage[backend=biber,style=numeric,sorting=none]{biblatex}

% Headers and footers
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\fancyhead[L]{\leftmark}
\fancyhead[R]{\thepage}
\fancyfoot[C]{Generated by \textcolor{blue}{\textbf{BEAGLE}} AI System}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.4pt}
\renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.4pt}

% Section styling
\usepackage{titlesec}
\titleformat{\section}
    {\Large\bfseries\color{blue}}
    {\thesection}{1em}{}
\titleformat{\subsection}
    {\large\bfseries}
    {\thesubsection}{1em}{}

% Line spacing
\usepackage{setspace}
\onehalfspacing

% Improved typography
\usepackage{microtype}

% Scientific units
\usepackage{siunitx}
\sisetup{
    detect-all,
    separate-uncertainty=true,
    output-decimal-marker={.},
}

% Algorithms
\usepackage{algorithm}
\usepackage{algpseudocode}

% Theorem environments
\theoremstyle{definition}
\newtheorem{definition}{Definition}[section]
\newtheorem{theorem}{Theorem}[section]
\newtheorem{lemma}[theorem]{Lemma}
\newtheorem{corollary}[theorem]{Corollary}
\newtheorem{proposition}[theorem]{Proposition}

\theoremstyle{remark}
\newtheorem{remark}{Remark}[section]
\newtheorem{example}{Example}[section]

% Custom commands
\newcommand{\beagle}{\textcolor{blue}{\textbf{BEAGLE}}}
\newcommand{\note}[1]{\textcolor{red}{\textbf{Note:} #1}}
\newcommand{\todo}[1]{\textcolor{orange}{\textbf{TODO:} #1}}

% Abstract styling
\renewenvironment{abstract}
    {\small\begin{center}\textbf{Abstract}\end{center}\begin{quotation}\noindent}
    {\end{quotation}}

% Adjust spacing
\setlength{\parskip}{0.5em}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
